author: Bouh
description:
Add support for gamepads (or other controllers) to your game, giving access to information such as button presses, axis positions, trigger pressure, etc...

Up to 4 gamepads can be connected: for each condition or expression, you'll have to enter the number of the gamepad to read. This is 1, 2,3 or 4.
name: Gamepads
shortDescription: Add support for gamepads (or other controllers) to your game, giving access to information such as button presses, axis positions, trigger pressure, etc...
tags: controllers, gamepads, joysticks, axis, xbox, ps4

eventsFunctions.description: Get the value of the pressure on a gamepad trigger.
eventsFunctions.name: TriggerPressure

eventsFunctions.description: Get the value of axis of a gamepad stick.
eventsFunctions.name: AxisValue

eventsFunctions.description: Return the index of the last button used on a gamepad
eventsFunctions.name: LastButtonId

eventsFunctions.description:
Test if a button is pressed on a gamepad. Buttons can be:
* Xbox: "A", "B", "X", "Y", "LB", "RB", "LT", "RT", "BACK", "START",
* PS4: "CROSS", "SQUARE", "CIRCLE", "TRIANGLE", "L1", "L2", "R1", "R2", "SHARE", "OPTIONS", "PS_BUTTON", "CLICK_TOUCHPAD",
* Other: "UP", "DOWN", "LEFT", "RIGHT", "CLICK_STICK_LEFT", "CLICK_STICK_RIGHT"
eventsFunctions.name: C_Button_pressed

eventsFunctions.description: Return the value of the deadzone applied to sticks
eventsFunctions.name: Deadzone

eventsFunctions.description: Set the deadzone for sticks of the gamepad. The deadzone is an area for which movement on sticks won't be taken into account (instead, the stick will be considered as not moved). Deadzone is between 0 and 1, and is by default 0.2.
eventsFunctions.name: A_Set_deadzone
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set deadzone for gamepad sticks to _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a stick of a gamepad is pushed in a given direction.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Gamepad stick pushed in a direction (axis)
eventsFunctions.name: C_Axis_pushed
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM2_ stick of gamepad _PARAM1_ is pushed in direction _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Return the number of connected gamepads
eventsFunctions.name: ConnectedGamepadsCount

eventsFunctions.description: Return a string containing information about the specified gamepad
eventsFunctions.name: GamepadType

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified gamepad has the specified information in its description.
eventsFunctions.name: C_Controller_type

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a gamepad is connected.
eventsFunctions.name: C_Controller_X_is_connected

eventsFunctions.description: Generate a vibration on the specified controller. Might only work if the game is running in a recent web browser.
eventsFunctions.name: A_Vibrate_controller

parameters.description: Time of the vibration, in seconds (optional, default value is 1)
parameters.name: duration
